{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM name="line_30.json">
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>groß 8v⁰.</FORMAT>
    <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR>
    <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>
    <PRIZE unit="unbound">46. kr.</PRIZE>
    <PRIZE unit="bound">fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8v⁰.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE unit="unbound">6. Batzen</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Anfang der Geographie</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8v⁰.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8v⁰.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>12. Batzen</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8v⁰.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>18. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Gespräch von den Wärmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE>
    <PRIZE>8. Rappen</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":12,"explanation":"1. Added 'name' attribute to the ITEM tag to match the file name. 2. Properly nested all BIBL tags with consistent indentation. 3. Fixed the encoding issues in FORMAT tags (e.g., gro 8v to gro 8v⁰). 4. Added a 'unit' attribute to PRIZE tags where appropriate to distinguish between bound and unbound prices. 5. Fixed the inconsistent use of PRICE vs PRIZE (standardized to PRIZE). 6. Removed stray punctuation in price fields. 7. Properly closed all XML tags. 8. Fixed the encoding in book titles (e.g., Anfng to Anfang). 9. Fixed the encoding in author names (e.g., Gesprch to Gespräch). 10. Added proper XML structure with consistent nesting. 11. Fixed the encoding of special characters (e.g.,  to appropriate characters). 12. Added proper spacing and indentation for readability."}

parsed.fixed_xml:
<ITEM name="line_30.json">
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>groß 8v⁰.</FORMAT>
    <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR>
    <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>
    <PRIZE unit="unbound">46. kr.</PRIZE>
    <PRIZE unit="bound">fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8v⁰.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE unit="unbound">6. Batzen</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Anfang der Geographie</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8v⁰.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8v⁰.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>12. Batzen</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8v⁰.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>18. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Gespräch von den Wärmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE>
    <PRIZE>8. Rappen</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation: 1. Added 'name' attribute to the ITEM tag to match the file name. 2. Properly nested all BIBL tags with consistent indentation. 3. Fixed the encoding issues in FORMAT tags (e.g., gro 8v to gro 8v⁰). 4. Added a 'unit' attribute to PRIZE tags where appropriate to distinguish between bound and unbound prices. 5. Fixed the inconsistent use of PRICE vs PRIZE (standardized to PRIZE). 6. Removed stray punctuation in price fields. 7. Properly closed all XML tags. 8. Fixed the encoding in book titles (e.g., Anfng to Anfang). 9. Fixed the encoding in author names (e.g., Gesprch to Gespräch). 10. Added proper XML structure with consistent nesting. 11. Fixed the encoding of special characters (e.g.,  to appropriate characters). 12. Added proper spacing and indentation for readability.
